Join us for a workshop about BigQuery! BigQuery is a big data service provided by Google Cloud Platform. BigQuery is highly scalable, low cost and serverless. If you are familiar with SQL you can analyze your data without needing a database administrator. Moreover, BigQuery allows users to create charts from datasets.

** Speaker **

GÃ¶khan, Sr. Software Developer at Comodo, will present the theory behind BigQuery. After the presentation there will be a demo about how BigQuery can be used.

The demo will consist a small BigQuery integration example with Spring Boot. At the end of the event, a github repository will be available.
